name: Color Changing Martini

ingredients.name: Dropper of b’Lure butterfly pea flower extract

preparation:
This cocktail from Public Belt at the Hilton New Orleans Riverside changes color from light purple to deep purple to a bright fuschia.

Add all of the ingredients except for the lemon juice into a shaker with ice, and shake until chilled.

Strain into a Martini glass, and add the lemon juice to change the color.
